description:
Tsubasa’s sister, Mina, is struggling to find the right career. Can a tour around her brother’s workplace and a heart-to-heart help point her in the right direction?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Bokutachi wa Asaokiru no ga Matenakatta
We Couldn`t Wait to Wake Up in the Morning
僕たちは朝起きるのが待てなかった
